title: 88/532/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 October 1988 approving a Greek programme for feedingstuffs pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 October 1988
approving a Greek programme for feedingstuffs pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(88/532/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for feedingstuffs which was forwarded by the Greek Government on 14 September 1987 and supplemented on 18 April 1988 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 October 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
